name: FoodCart in Apocalypse
description:
i'll recomend playing the windows version, the browser version has some performence issue.

Made for Mix and Game jam 2020 in 48 hours

Make food to get bullet to kill zombies that wants to eat your food!

WASD - movement

mouse - aim

LMB - shoot

Space - open cart

E - give food

R - Restart

Alt + F4 - Quit!

(Ctrl + Scroll to zoom out for playing in browser)
